role.role_description: Leads, coaches, schedules tasks and projects for members (5). Reviews and monitors progress, leads testing and code reviews, deals with clients requests for enhancements, changes, new projects and due dates. Decision-making and team managements are main responsibilities.

Handles development and operations tasks like system administration for Git, other projects such as Chef, Vagrant, KVM, maintain servers for development use. Works on open source technologies and Linux environment, virtualizations, web development and VoIP technologies.
In charge of development issues and approves workflows, requests, directly involved with company management. Also has an administrative functions and Recruitment process
Provides assistance and virtual work for a client in remote for some clerical works done in Excel and PowerPoint, with minimal graphics designing.

for a web based user interfaces and emails for different clients.
